name.description: Event name; Defining it here as Loopback fails on querying with regexp on properties that are not defined in the model; Needed for querying person directly

description.description: Event description; Defining it here as Loopback fails on querying with regexp on properties that are not defined in the model; Needed for querying person directly

dateOfInfection.description: Case property; Defining it here as on sync we use the person model and not the case model

dateOfOnset.description: Case property; Defining it here as on sync we use the person model and not the case model

dateBecomeCase.description: Case property; Defining it here as on sync we use the person model and not the case model

dateRanges.description: Case property; Defining it here as on sync we use the person model and not the case model

classificationHistory.description: Case property; Defining it here as on sync we use the person model and not the case model

followUpHistory.description: Contact property; Defining it here as on sync we use the person model and not the contact model

dateOfOutcome.description: Case/Contact property; Defining it here as on sync we use the person model and not the case/contact model

dateOfBurial.description: Case/Contact property; Defining it here as on sync we use the person model and not the case/contact model

dateBecomeCase.description: Case property; Defining it here as on sync we use the person model and not the case model

dateBecomeContact.description: Contact property; Defining it here as on sync we use the person model and not the contact model

dateBecomeContactOfContact.description: Contact of contact property; Defining it here as on sync we use the person model and not the contact of contact model

followUp.description: Contact property; Defining it here as on sync we use the person model and not the contact model. Object containing start/end dates for the contact's follow-up period. The dates are automatically calculated based on contact relationships dates and outbreak.periodOfFollowup

originalStartDate.description: Date of the contact's earliest relationship (first contactDate)

startDate.description: Latest contactDate of the contact's relationships

endDate.description: Follow-up end date for the contact. Calculated from the startDate + outbreak.periodOfFollowup days

generateFollowUpsDateOfLastContact.description: Flag specifying if contact tracing should start on the date of the last contact

followUpTeamId.description: Contact property; Allocated team for contact follow-ups; Defining it here as on sync we use the person model and not the contact model

date.description: Event property; Defining it here as on sync we use the person model and not the event model

hasRelationships.description: Flag that specifies if a case/contact/event has at least a relationship.

relationshipsRepresentation.description: Array containing entries for the relationships where the person is a participant

notDuplicatesIds.description: Array containing IDs for persons that system detected as possible duplicates but they aren't duplicates

usualPlaceOfResidenceLocationId.description: Location ID for the usual place of residence address.
